Slot start.content: The slot will contain two rounds, the beacon round and the execution round

Beacon Lottery.content: The beacon proposer for the next block is already chosen for this block

Block Proposed.content: The proposer proposes the block with only the inclusion list - therefore home stakers can participate without a handicap.

Block Attested.content: The Attester comittee attests the validity of the inclusion list.

Execution Lottery.content: The rights to execute the current block with the inclusion list already belong to a proposer.

Exec Block Proposed.content: The block is executed with the inclusion list and any other MEV related transactions and proposed.

Exec Block Attested.content: The execution block committee attests the validity of the block.
